subject: Hello!
body:
Hello!
My name is Miss. Rawan Alkhalaf, a female single am Libya Citizen, But I and my parents relocated to Turkey when the war broke out in Libya 2011 since then we have been living in Turkey Gaziantep province until the recent earthquake that made me lose my parents which has affected me so much.  I need your kind and urgent assistance to build a sincere and honest relationship. My late dad deposited $55 Million Dollars cash in a private security vault at Dubai United Arab Emirate.
Meanwhile, I wish to solicit for your services to be my foreign partner/investor and support me to transfer and manage my funds by investing in profit making ventures like buying of company shares, Real Estate Investment Trust funds, or Agriculture. I am ready to part 30% of entire funds to you as your own gratification while the 70% will be strictly for the investment. At the successful transfer of the funds, I will relocate to your country.
I have no experience or perfection in running a business; I would like you to help me invest it in your country. I will send you all the documents relating to the funds once I hear from you with good intention to assist me. Please, if you are interested to collaborate with me kindly contact me on my private email 
missrawanalkahalaf@gmail.com
 for more details.
May Allah/God bless you earnestly.
Yours Sincerely,
Miss Rawan

subject: Re:   Hello!
body:
Hello Miss Rawan,

I'm really sorry to hear about your situation. It must be tough for you, especially losing your parents in such a tragic way. I hope you're managing okay.

Your proposal sounds interesting, but I have a few questions if you don't mind. You mentioned that the funds are currently in a private security vault in Dubai. How did they end up there? Also, what kind of business ventures are you interested in investing in?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brian

subject: Re: Hello!
body:
Dear Mr Brian


Thanks for your email and the contents are well comprehended. My late
father deposited the cash money in a private security vault in Dubai not in
a bank. They are all in $100 dollars denomination. However, for us to
proceed with this transaction, you should email me

(a) Your full name and address.
(b) Your age.
(c) Your marital status and employment status.
(d) Your phone number.

(e) A copy of your identification

It is the above information that I will use to start up with all the
necessary legal documentation that will make you the legal beneficiary of
the said money. In fact, I will use the information to prepare a power of
attorney. The Power of Attorney from me will be a legal document
authorizing the deposit company to release that said deposit to you. It
will also give you the legal entitlement of the deposit and will show or
prove to the deposit company that I gave you the power to collect the
deposit being my proxy beneficiary on my behalf as per the instruction I
have earlier given the company when the consignment was deposited with
them. It is after I have completed the legal documentation that you can
open communication with the company that will facilitate the consignment
being released to you .It will take me three working days to perfect the
legal documentation.

Finally, after you have taken possession of the consignment, I would like
to invest part of my share of the money in any business you have good
knowledge about. I would also like to invest in Real Estate business in
your country.

I am looking forward to establishing a long lasting business and personal
relationship with you.
Best regards,

Miss Rawan

subject: Re: Hello!
body:
Hello Miss Rawan,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting situation you've found yourself in! I'm curious about a few things, though.

Firstly, how did your late father come to deposit such a large sum of money in a private security vault in Dubai? That must have been quite the undertaking. 

Secondly, I'm intrigued by the legal process you mentioned. Could you explain it a bit more? How does one go about preparing a power of attorney and what exactly does it entail?

Lastly, I'm flattered that you're considering investing in my country's Real Estate business. However, I'd like to know more about why you chose this particular industry and why you believe it would be a good investment.

I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Brian

subject: Re: Hello!
body:
Hello Miss Rawan,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting situation you've found yourself in, and I'm glad to hear that you're considering some investments. Real Estate can indeed be a lucrative field.

However, before we proceed further, could you please provide me with more information about the legal procedures involved? I'm not very familiar with these matters and would like to understand them better.

Also, could you tell me more about the private security vault in Dubai where the money is currently held? How does it operate?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brian

subject: Re: Hello!
body:
Hello Miss Rawan,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting situation you've found yourself in! I'm curious about a few things, though.

Firstly, how did your late father come to deposit such a large sum of money in a private security vault in Dubai? That must have been quite the undertaking. 

Secondly, I'm wondering why you chose me to help with this matter. We don't know each other personally, so it's intriguing that you'd trust me with such an important task.

Lastly, I'm interested in hearing more about your plans for investment. You mentioned wanting to invest in Real Estate business in my country - do you have any specific areas or types of properties in mind?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Brian
